title: More Mid AD Assassins
body:
Hello Riot,

I would really like to have a new Midlane AD Assassin Champions. Ones like Zed and Talon (which are basically the only ones that are like the ones i want.)

replies.body: i personally think thats not a good idea (as a zed main) because of the simple fact that especially in dynamic queue there are so many full ad comps that really ****. and thats because of ad champs on mid lane. and another contra argument for me is that there are so many assasins in the game (and i nearly play only assasins) that you dont need another one.
